<!-- Generated by documentation.js. Update this documentation by updating the source code. -->

## getRelationship

Retrieves the relationship configuration for a specific user in a guild.

### Parameters

*   `guildId` **[string][1]** The ID of the guild.
*   `userId` **[string][1]** The ID of the user.

Returns **[Object][2]** The relationship configuration object.

## setRelationship

Sets the relationship configuration for a specific user in a guild.

### Parameters

*   `guildId` **[string][1]** The ID of the guild.
*   `userId` **[string][1]** The ID of the user.
*   `config` **[Object][2]** The new relationship configuration.

## loadGuildRelationships

Load relationships for a guild from disk and cache in memory

### Parameters

*   `guildId` **[string][1]** Discord guild ID
*   `guildName` **[string][1]** Discord guild name

Returns **[Object][2]** Relationships for the guild

## saveGuildRelationships

Save all relationships for a guild to disk

### Parameters

*   `guildId` **[string][1]** Discord guild ID
*   `guildName` **[string][1]** Discord guild name

## initializeGuildRelationships

Initialize relationships for a guild by enumerating members and
assigning the default relationship to users that do not already have one.

### Parameters

*   `guild` **Guild** discord.js Guild object

## getAllRelationships

Expose function to get all relationships for inspection

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String

[2]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object
